title: No clown masks in the U.S., caris $50,000 fine.
subtitle: Among the false news materials published during the panic of clowns throughout the country were allegations that clown masks were banned and that wearing them could result in fines of $50,000.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: The clown masks were banned in the United States, and the wearing of one could result in a $50,000 fine.
